samples.question: And do you think children's ideas can be influenced by the school they go to and why?
samples.transcript: Yes. yes, I think so. Because the environment is really important.

samples.question: Do you think students get influenced by other students at university?
samples.transcript: Yes, I think so. But it depends whether they are they are their best friends or not. I think we get more influenced by our best friends more than the others. All right. Thank you very much.

samples.question: Do you work or are you a student?
samples.transcript: Actually I am working and I have been working for several years now. I am an English teacher.
samples.transcript_original: Um, actually I'm working and I've been working for several years now. I'm an English teacher.

samples.question: And what do you like about your job?
samples.transcript: I would say my job is quite challenging, but there are so many things I enjoy doing. And one of them is helping my students grow in confidence as they master their language skills. I think it is beautiful when students work on themselves and they work towards achieving their dreams and I am there to help them. Okay.

samples.question: Is it important to be patient?
samples.transcript: I think it is. whether you are working on your project or want to build good relationships with people or or in my case rapple with my students, you need to be patient. you need to know when it is time to like if there is a problem you need to know when it is time to stop and maybe take a deep breath and think about what is going on instead of losing your patience. we are going to move on now and I am going to move on to give you a topic. I would like you to talk about it for one to two minutes.

samples.question: Can you start talking now please?
samples.transcript: Yes, sure. so the the event when I tried some foreign dish that I liked happened around three years ago. Back then I lived in Poland and I shared my flat with a person who came from India. and once he asked me to try like to share a meal with him. Honestly, I was taken a back at first because I was really like I did not expect that. And before that, I had had some unpleasant experience with Indian cuisine. because once I tried their soup and it was so spicy, so hot that I thought I was going to die. But so going back to my point he asked me to share a meal and I was a little bit hesitant. I did not know what to say but I really did not want to you know make him sad. So I said yes even though I was not feeling like trying his food. but I saw how how he was cooking it and it felt like it looked quite good and safe and then once we sat together and started eating I realized how wrong I was because it was so mouthwatering and actually I could not expect anything like that. I do not know the name of the dish, but it was with rice and chicken meat. I guess it is kind of staple food for people who live in India. And it was not that spicy at all. as we were eating and you know sharing some good stories over a meal, I felt so good about being able to explore something new and also connect with my friend on. Okay, I am going to stop you there. Thank you very very much. great. So, we have been talking there about a foreign food that you have tried. I am going to go on and ask some questions related to that next. so.

samples.question: So, in your country, do people cook at home as often as they did in the past?
samples.transcript: Well, I would say they cook quite often, but definitely it is been changing because these days many young men and women are working full-time. So, rarely do they have enough free time to cook meals for their family on a daily basis. So instead of cooking every single meal at home, they rather order something online or go to cafes or restaurants if they can afford it. Mhm.
samples.transcript_original: Um, well, I would say they cook quite often, but definitely it's been changing because these days many young men and women uh are working full-time. So, rarely do they have enough free time to cook meals for their family on a daily basis. So instead of cooking every single meal at home, they rather order something online or go to cafes or restaurants if they can afford it. Mhm.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I would say they cook quite often, but definitely it is been changing because these days many young men and women are working full-time. So, rarely do they have enough free time to cook meals for their family on a daily basis. So instead of cooking every single meal at home, they rather order something online or go to cafes or restaurants if they can afford it. Mhm.

samples.question: What do you think of people using their mobile phones during a meal?
samples.transcript: Well I think I think this is kind of behavior that is usually frowned upon in my country and in my opinion it is not really nice to use a phone like to be glued to your phone when you are sharing a meal with someone else. I think it is not polite and of course if there is no serious reason why you need to use your phone, then you should stay away from it.

samples.question: Do you think it is important to communicate with your family when you are eating together?

So to ensure that your family bones are as strong as they could be, I think telling about your telling your family members about your day and about what kind of things you have been through through it is a nice idea like why not? it it helps you to open up and feel better. It can uplift your mood and gives it gives you the feeling that you are a part of something bigger than yourself.

samples.question: So, what do you think constitutes a healthy diet?
samples.transcript: I would say eating clean and staying away from different kinds of processed food or convenience food as much as you can. So wholesome home-cooked meals are the best ones in my opinion when it comes to healthy eating. And of course you should try to strike a balance between eating something delicious and healthy. I mean trying to incorporate fruit and vegetables in your meals. I think that could help you to stay healthy and fit.
samples.transcript_original: Um, I would say eating clean and staying away from different kinds of processed food or convenience food um as much as you can. So wholesome home-cooked meals are the best ones uh in my opinion when it comes to healthy eating. And of course uh you should try to strike a balance between eating something delicious and healthy. I mean trying to incorporate fruit and vegetables in your meals. I think that could help you to stay um healthy and fit.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I would say eating clean and staying away from different kinds of processed food or convenience food as much as you can. So wholesome home-cooked meals are the best ones in my opinion when it comes to healthy eating. And of course you should try to strike a balance between eating something delicious and healthy. I mean trying to incorporate fruit and vegetables in your meals. I think that could help you to stay healthy and fit.
